item.title: 乔-拜登总统在国情咨文演讲中批评了美国共和党领跑者唐纳德-特朗普，但从未提到他的名字。美联社记者乔希-博克（Josh Boak）为您详细解读。
item.description:
President Joe Biden used his State of the Union address to criticize GOP front-runner Donald Trump — without ever mentioning him by name. AP’s Josh Boak explains more. pic.twitter.com/EIrOLrMjyr

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统周四晚发表了热情洋溢的国情咨文。以下是您错过的所有重要时刻。
item.description:
President Joe Biden delivered a feisty State of the Union address on Thursday night. Here are all the major moments you missed. pic.twitter.com/wIwUJK0NbP

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 这是共和党人所要求的，但从未预料到的。乔-拜登总统说出了她的名字："拉肯-莱利。"这就是国情咨文演讲中那一刻的前因后果。
item.description:
It was what the Republicans demanded, but never expected. President Joe Biden said her name: “Laken Riley.”

This is what led up to that moment during the State of the Union address. https://t.co/OL9ubyhOzu pic.twitter.com/4iRJrX6GTZ

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 爱荷华州准备终止管理机构性别均等规则，多样性政策成为全国性目标

item.title: 乔-拜登总统在国情咨文演讲中嘲笑最高法院推翻 "罗伊诉韦德案 "的裁决，而在该裁决中占多数的大法官就坐在不远处。
item.description:
President Joe Biden derided the Supreme Court ruling that overturned Roe v. Wade during his State of the Union address, with justices who were in the majority in that decision seated just feet away.

Key moments, and takeaways, from his speech. https://t.co/NFuiL2jRlu pic.twitter.com/2m6BppVBqy

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 在国情咨文中，拜登总统举起了一枚别针，这是众议员马乔里-泰勒-格林（Marjorie Taylor Greene）在格林大喊拉肯-莱利（Laken Riley）的名字后递给他的。莱利是佐治亚州一名 22 岁的护理专业学生，警方称她是被一名非法入境的移民杀害的。
item.description:
During the State of the Union, President Biden held up a pin that Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene had handed to him after Greene yelled Laken Riley's name. Riley was a 22-year-old Georgia nursing student who police say was killed by an immigrant in the country illegally. pic.twitter.com/mO9ULdMRQt

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 参议员凯蒂-布里特（Katie Britt）是参议院中最年轻的女议员，她将在共和党对总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）国情咨文演讲的反驳中，对拜登总统提出尖锐的选举年批评。
item.description:
Sen. Katie Britt, the youngest woman in the Senate, is set to deliver a stinging election-year critique of President Joe Biden in the Republican rebuttal to his State of the Union address. https://t.co/Vy3N4ecnkf

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 乔-拜登总统在年度国情咨文演讲中迅速将矛头指向唐纳德-特朗普和共和党人，指责他们在2021年1月6日对国会大厦的袭击。"他说："我的前任和在座的一些人试图掩盖1月6日的真相。
item.description:
President Joe Biden during his annual State of the Union address quickly targeted Donald Trump and Republicans over the Capitol attack on Jan. 6, 2021. "My predecessor and some of you here seek to bury the truth about Jan. 6. I will not do that," he said. https://t.co/Jn5nhSVE1n pic.twitter.com/dvm5FCtRYW

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 熊队与职业碗 CB 杰伦-约翰逊达成 4 年 7,600 万美元续约协议
item.description:
Bears, Pro Bowl CB Jaylon Johnson agree to 4-year, $76 million contract extension https://t.co/XNpEkRVmHY

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 按照惯例，至少有一名内阁成员不出席国情咨文演讲，以便在发生灾难时保持宪法规定的继承关系。今年的指定幸存者是教育部长米格尔-卡多纳（Miguel Cardona）。
item.description:
By custom, at least one Cabinet member does not attend the State of the Union speech in order to preserve the Constitutional line of succession in the event of a catastrophe. This year's designated survivor is Secretary of Education Miguel Cardona. https://t.co/pxQYSlR8d7

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 在乔-拜登（Joe Biden）总统的国情咨文演讲中，一群民主党女议员身着白衣发表声明。请关注美联社的现场报道：
item.description:
Groups of Democratic women lawmakers are making a statement in white at President Joe Biden's State of the Union address. This time, it’s for reproductive rights.

Follow AP's live coverage: https://t.co/alyiDiQwyk pic.twitter.com/WK5cpfWeaM

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024

item.title: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）一架飞往日本的喷气式客机在从旧金山起飞时丢失了一个轮胎，于周四安全降落在洛杉矶。
item.description:
A United Airlines jetliner bound for Japan made a safe landing in Los Angeles on Thursday after losing a tire while taking off from San Francisco. pic.twitter.com/9dKM6Qc1tp

— The Associated Press (@AP) March 8, 2024
